summary: One of six travelers who catch the bus from Casablanca airport to Marrakesh is carrying $2 million to pay a local operator to fix United Nations votes. But which one?
cast: Tony Randall|Senta Berger|Herbert Lom|Wilfrid Hyde-White|Terry-Thomas|Grégoire Aslan|John Le Mesurier|Klaus Kinski|Margaret Lee|Emile Stemmler|Helen Sanguinetti|Francisco Sánchez|William Sanguinetti|Hassan Essakali|Keith Peacock|Burt Kwouk|David de Keyser|Maria Rohm
keywords: espionage|dual identity|bare chested male|hairy chest|femme fatale
title: Intriga brutal
